009package Ch16_Color_Edges;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
015import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
016import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
017import imagingbook.common.edges.EdgeDetector;
018import imagingbook.common.edges.MultiGradientEdgeDetector;
019import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
020import imagingbook.core.jdoc.JavaDocHelp;
021import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
022
023import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
024
025/**
026 * <p>
027 * This ImageJ plugin implements a multi-gradient (DiZenzo/Cumani-style) color edge detector. See Sec. 16.2 (Alg. 16.2) of [1]
028 * for additional details.
029 * </p>
030 * <p>
031 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
032 * (2022).
033 * </p>
034 *
035 * @author WB
036 * @version 2022/12/12
037 * @see MultiGradientEdgeDetector
038 */
039public class Color_Edges_DiZenzo implements PlugInFilter, JavaDocHelp {
040
041        private static boolean ShowEdgeMagnitude = true;
042        private static boolean ShowEdgeOrientation = false;
043        
044        private ImagePlus im = null;
045
046        /**
047         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open.
048         */
049        public Color_Edges_DiZenzo() {
050                if (noCurrentImage()) {
051                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Balloons600);
052                }
053        }
054
055        @Override
056    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
057        this.im = im;
058        return DOES_RGB + NO_CHANGES;
059    }
060
061        @Override
062    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
063        if (!runDialog()) {
064                        return;
065                }
066        
067        ColorProcessor cp = (ColorProcessor) ip;
068        EdgeDetector ced = new MultiGradientEdgeDetector(cp);
069        
070        if (ShowEdgeMagnitude) {
071                FloatProcessor edgeMagnitude = ced.getEdgeMagnitude();
072                (new ImagePlus("Edge Magnitude (DiZenzo)", edgeMagnitude)).show();
073        }
074                if (ShowEdgeOrientation) {
075                        FloatProcessor edgeOrientation = ced.getEdgeOrientation();
076                        (new ImagePlus("Edge Orientation (DiZenzo)", edgeOrientation)).show();
077                }
078    }
079    
080    boolean runDialog() {
081                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Multi-Gradient Color Edges");
082                gd.addHelp(getJavaDocUrl());
083                gd.addCheckbox("Show edge magnitude", ShowEdgeMagnitude);
084                gd.addCheckbox("Show edge orientation", ShowEdgeOrientation);
085
086                gd.showDialog();
087                if(gd.wasCanceled())
088                        return false;
089
090                ShowEdgeMagnitude = gd.getNextBoolean();
091                ShowEdgeOrientation =  gd.getNextBoolean();
092                return true;
093    }
094}
095
